caption.html: The typography was animated to follow the movement patters found in video work of Suzie Howell. The captured frames were then vectorised and used throughout the promotional content.
caption.text: The typography was animated to follow the movement patters found in video work of Suzie Howell. The captured frames were then vectorised and used throughout the promotional content.

caption.html: (1)(2)(3): Printed look book spreads: digital print, 48pp A set of three aluminium plates inspired by Ruder’s eloquent description of typographic form and counter form.

right: n65 arm

caption.html: Floating in the space between form and counterform, the sculptures offer a physicality to the design process and highlight the craft of Frutigers typography.
caption.text: Floating in the space between form and counterform, the sculptures offer a physicality to the design process and highlight the craft of Frutigers typography.
